name: Golden Roasted Cauliflower and Quinoa Salad{Video} - Fit Foodie Finds
instructions: Prepare the dressing by adding all ingredients into a mason jar. Close the jar tight and shake until dressing is mixed well.
Next, prepare roasted golden cauliflower by following the directions HERE.
Let the roasted cauliflower cool for 15 minutes before chopping into bite-sized pieces.
Then, add all of the ingredients for the salad into a large bowl. Mix well.
Pour dressing over salad ingredients and toss until everything is coated in dressing.
